=CajuScript Introdution=

Is a script language very simple for work on Java.

Have good features to create newly instances of class  and invocation of methods.

In CajuScript was implemented many ways to do easy the programming in Java.

All basics resources of programing like:

  * Variables
  * [tutorialArray Arrays]
  * [tutorialIf If]
  * [tutorialLoop Loop]
  * [tutorialFunction Function
  * [tutorialImportAndInclude Imports and Includes
  * [tutorialCast Cast]


Easy to use Java. Sample:
{{{
    $java.lang
    str = "Hello world!"
    len = 0
    len < str.length() @
        System.out.println(str.substring(len, len + 1))
        len += 1
    @
    System.out.println(str.replaceAll("Hello", "Hi"))
    str = StringBuilder(str)
    str.append(" Bye bye bye...")
    System.out.println(str)
}}}

You can see the [http://code.google.com/p/cajuscript/wiki/tutorialSintax overview of sintax].
